name: nkpl
description: The Namish Kumar Programming Language is a programming language made by Namish Kumar in July 2022. The base language of this programming language is JavaScript. It has a simple syntax as compared to other programming languages. To use this programming language, You have to install Node JS in your system. That's all about NKPL.
author: Namish Kumar <namishkumar000@gmail.com> (https://nkpl.namishkumar.in/)
